verifySign.title: Result of verifying signature
verifySign.notVerifiedDocMsg: The integrity of the document that was signed has not yet been verified.
verifySign.notVerifiedIdentityMsg: The signer's identity has not yet been verified.
verifySign.incredibleMsg: There is a leak in this digital signature document
verifySign.noSupportFormat: The {{filter}} signature handler could not support {{subFilter}} format.
verifySign.noSupportHandler: The {{filter}} signature handler could not be found.
verifySign.errorDataMsg: Signature data is destroyed (that means the signature data cannot be parsed properly).
verifySign.errorDataDetail: Details: The signature has error data
verifySign.errorByteRangeMsg: Unexpected byte range values defining scope of signed data.
verifySign.errorByteRangeDetail: Details: The signature byte range is invalid
verifySign.errorsInSignatureMsg: This signature is invalid because there are errors in the formatting or information contained in this signature.
verifySign.identityValidAndUntrustedMsg: The signer's identity is valid, but you have not trusted the signer's certificate for the purpose of the creating certified documents.
verifySign.verifyNoChange: The document has not been changed within the scope of the signature.
verifySign.verifyNoChange_online: The document has not been modified since this signature was applied.
verifySign.verifyNoChange_certify: The document has not been modified since this signature was certified.
verifySign.verifyAlteredCorrupted: The document has been altered or corrupted since the Signature was applied.
verifySign.verifyFuture: Signature seems to be signed in future.
verifySign.verifyChange: The document has been changed within the scope of the signature. (This indicates that signature is invalid.)
verifySign.verifyChange_online: The revision of the document that was covered by this signature has not been altered; however, there have been subsequent changes to the document.
verifySign.verifyChange_certify: This document has been modified since being certified, but these modifications are allowed and do not invalidate the signature.
verifySign.verifyUnknown: The document changed state is unknown.
verifySign.changeLegal: The document has been changed outside of signature scope, but the changed is permitted.
verifySign.changeIllegal: The document has been changed outside of signature scope, and the changed invalidate the signature.
verifySign.errorByteRange: There are some errors in the formatting or information contained in the signature
verifySign.issuerRevoke: The signer's identity was invalid at this time, due to the certificate has been revoked after checking.
verifySign.issuerExpire_mac: The certificate has exceeded the time of validity.
verifySign.issuerExpire: The Signer's identify is invalid because it has expired or is not yet valid.
verifySign.issueExpire: Certificate for verifying issuer is expired.
verifySign.issueCurrent: The verified issuer is current issuer.
verifySign.issueRevoke: Certificate for verifying issuer is revoked.
verifySign.issuerValidAndIssueRevoke: The signer's identity is valid, but revocation of the signer's identity could not be checked.
verifySign.issuerIdentityUnknown: The signer's identity is unknown because it has not been included in your list of trusted identities and none of its parent certificates are trusted identities.
verifySign.issueUnknown: Verification state of the issuer is unknown.
verifySign.timestampExpire: Verification state of the time stamp is expired.
verifySign.timestampExpire_online: Signature is a document timestamp signature but it is expired.
verifySign.timestampDoc: The signature is a time stamp signature.
verifySign.timestampDoc_online: Signature is a document timestamp signature.
verifySign.timestampNone: No time stamp or not check time stamp.
verifySign.timestampNone_online: Signing time is from the clock on the signer's computer.
verifySign.timestampEmbeddedAndExpire: The signature includes an embedded timestamp but it is expired.
verifySign.timestampEmbeddedAndExpire_mac:
The signature includes an embedded timestamp but it is expired. Timestamp time:
 {{timestamp}}
verifySign.timestampEmbeddedAndExpire_mac_panel: The signature includes an embedded timestamp but it is expired.
verifySign.timestampEmbedded: The signature includes an embedded timestamp.
verifySign.timestampEmbedded_mac:
The signature includes an embedded timestamp. Timestamp time:
 {{timestamp}}
verifySign.timestampEmbedded_mac_panel: The signature includes an embedded timestamp.
verifySign.timestampEmbeddedAndNotBeVerified: The signature includes an embedded timestamp but it could not be verified.
verifySign.timestampSecure: Signature was validated as of the secure(timestamp) time: {{timestamp}}
verifySign.timestampValid: Verification state of the time stamp is valid.
verifySign.timestampInvalid: Verification state of the time stamp is invalid.
verifySign.timestampIssueUnknown: Verification state of the time stamp issuer is unknown.
verifySign.timestampIssueValid: Verification state of the time stamp issuer is valid
verifySign.timestampTimeBefore: Verification state of the time stamp time is valid, since the times is before the expiration date.
verifySign.ltvNotEnabled: Signature is not LTV enabled and will expire after {{expireTime}}
verifySign.ltvNotEnabledTitle: Source of Trust obtained from Foxit Approved Trust List(FATL)
verifySign.compareSignedVersion: Compare Signed Version to Current Version
verifySign.validInfo: Signature is VALID and signed by {{signerInfo}}.
verifySign.validInfo_certify: Document certification is VALID and signed by {{signerInfo}}.
verifySign.incredibleInfo: There is a leak in this digital signature document, please contact the document provider.
verifySign.validPropertiesInfo_certify: Document certification is VALID, signed by {{signerInfo}}.
verifySign.validatedSigningTime:
Signature was validated as of the signing time:
 {{verifyTime}}
verifySign.validatedCurrentTime:
Signature was validated as of the current time:
 {{verifyTime}}
verifySign.validatedRevotime:
Signature was validated as of the revocation information collection time:
 {{verifyTime}}
verifySign.validatedTimeSecure:
Signature was validated as of the secure(timestamp) time:
 {{verifyTime}}
verifySign.untrustedMsgInProperties: When you directly trust a signer's certificate that is not issued by a root certificate authority, you should contact the signer to verify the certificate. Once you are confident that the signer is who he/she reports to be, then verify if the certificate is from the signer. For example, you can confirm the certificate's MD5 digest with the signer. (Use the Certificate Viewer to view the MD5 digest, and to import and directly trust the certificate.)
verifySign.timestampDes: Timestamp is embedded in the signature. Timestamps are signed just as documents are signed. For a timestamp signature to be valid you must have trusted the Timestamp Authority that signed the timestamp.
verifySign.timeStampShowCertificateDes: Click Show Certificate to view details regarding verification of the timestamp signature. Click Add to trusted certificates to trust it.

certificate.documentSignedBy: This document has been signed by:
certificate.manageTrustDlgTrustInfo: The signature is valid, but it is signed by a signer that you haven't trusted yet.
certificate.manageTrustDlgDesInfo: If this document came from a reputable source and you trust the identity of the signer, press the Trust Signer for Future Signatures button to add this signer to your list of trusted certificates and trust all future signatures from the same signer.
certificate.certificateViewerTrustMsg: A certificate used to sign a document must either be designated as a trust anchor or chain up to a trust anchor in order for signature validation to succeed. Revocation checking is not performed on or above a trust anchor.
certificate.trustRootLabel: Use this certificate as a trusted root
certificate.trustForLabel: If signature succeeds, trust this certificate for:
